description: The heroine of the anime. Yohko Mano is a typical schoolgirl who is crazy for handsome guys. Her grandmother gives Yohko the responsibility to be the 108th Devil Hunter and continue their family`s legacy of Devil Hunters. Now she fights as a devil hunter against demons that appear and interrupt her life and ruin her chances of ever getting with the guy of her dreams.
name: Mano Youko
